segment.source: You can use Standard User Analyzer (SUA) to test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues related to the User Account Control (UAC) feature in Windows.
segment.target: You can use Standard User Analyzer (SUA) to test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues related to the User Account Control (UAC) feature in Windows.

segment.source: You can use Standard User Analyzer (SUA) to test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues related to the User Account Control (UAC) feature in Windows.
segment.target: You can use Standard User Analyzer (SUA) to test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues related to the User Account Control (UAC) feature in Windows.

segment.source: You can use SUA in either of the following ways:
segment.target: You can use SUA in either of the following ways:

segment.source: A wizard that guides you through a step-by-step process to locate and fix issues, without options for additional analysis.
segment.target: A wizard that guides you through a step-by-step process to locate and fix issues, without options for additional analysis.

segment.source: A full-function tool in which you can perform in-depth analysis and fix issues.
segment.target: A full-function tool in which you can perform in-depth analysis and fix issues.

segment.source: The Standard User Analyzer (SUA) Wizard works much like the SUA tool to evaluate User Account Control (UAC) issues.
segment.target: The Standard User Analyzer (SUA) Wizard works much like the SUA tool to evaluate User Account Control (UAC) issues.

segment.source: However, the SUA Wizard does not offer detailed analysis, and it cannot disable virtualization or elevate your permissions.
segment.target: However, the SUA Wizard does not offer detailed analysis, and it cannot disable virtualization or elevate your permissions.

segment.source: By using the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues with the User Account Control (UAC) feature.
segment.target: By using the Standard User Analyzer (SUA) tool, you can test your applications and monitor API calls to detect compatibility issues with the User Account Control (UAC) feature.

segment.source: Deciding Whether to Fix an Application or Deploy a Workaround
segment.target: Deciding Whether to Fix an Application or Deploy a Workaround
